author: asianlego
title: Easy to tumble down.
review: We got this for my baby brother's first birthday and he can easily build and take it apart thanks to the smooth rounded studs. It has some normal Baby bricks and two printed bricks - one printed with a Firetruck toy on it and another one is my favorite - a yellow brick printed with the Lego logo on two sides. A nice way to show your love of Lego is to take your baby brother's Lego logo printed piece and claim it yours. The set also has two figures - a Baby Mickey and a Baby Minnie.
